meanings.definition: A very large shopping center with a wide variety of stores and entertainment options.
meanings.sent1: The megamall in our town has a lot of different shops and fun things to do.
meanings.sent2: Let's go to the megamall this weekend to buy new clothes and watch a movie.
meanings.sent3: I got lost in the megamall trying to find the toy store!
meanings.sent4: Her closet was like a megamall, filled with endless options for outfits.
meanings.sent5: The megamall was so huge, it felt like a city of shops under one roof.

meanings.definition: The largest type of shopping mall, typically featuring multiple levels and a large number of stores.
meanings.sent1: The new megamall being built will have five floors and over a hundred stores.
meanings.sent2: I heard the megamall in the next town over is the biggest one in the state.
meanings.sent3: The megamall was so big, it felt like a maze of shops and escalators.
meanings.sent4: Her purse was like a mini megamall, with compartments for everything she needed.
meanings.sent5: Visiting the megamall was like stepping into a bustling city of shops and people.
